title: RP change suggestion
body:
Change the price instead of the amount of RP given, because all the damn RP costs are balanced around NA amounts of RP. So you still get 1380 RP, but it costs $12 or $13 instead of $10, for example.

You know, as opposed to having to buy $15 of RP for a 1350 skin and have 270 sitting there afterward.
